text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.title: SIHYWTCAMD Configuration
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.genera: Mobs don't flee if target is half health
Most hostile mobs are hostile to villagers
Mobs don't pathfind through blocks when riding
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.overwo: Creepers explosions deal mining fatigue for max (s)
Creepers explosions deal weakness for max (s)
Slimes can spawn with one more size
Small and normal sized slimes can merge
Slimes turn into magma cubes in lava in the nether
Vexes can spawn naturally in dark forest
Guardians make a beam sound only when hurting players
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.undead: Undead are healed with damages they deal
Undead don't take revenge on other undead
Phantoms can spawn in end cities
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.zombie: Zombies have a knockback resistance bonus
Zombies have more chance to spawn reinforcement
Zombies can spawn reinforcement of same zombie type
Zombies can spawn with attributes variations
Baby zombies can spawn with X babies on top
Husks are immune to fire damages
Drowned spawn more often with a trident
Drowned have an increased velocity in water
Baby drowned can spawn riding a guardian
Zombified Piglins can spawn as brutes
Zombie horse trap can spawn during thunder
Mobs ride them at higher speed
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.skelet: Skeletons flee player if too close
Strays can spawn in any cold biome
Wither skeletons can spawn carrying a bow (if adult)
Wither skeletons have an iron sword
Skeletons horse trap spawn different type of skeletons
Mobs ride them at higher speed
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.arthro: Larvae have a random speed bonus
Cave spiders can spawn naturally in caves
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.illage: Pillagers get more often piercing enchant
Vindicators can spawn with a speed bonus
Witches flee player if too close
Witches can spawn a bit more often
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.nether: Blazes set entities on fire on attack
Blazes have a reduced follow range
Ghasts health is increased a lot
Magma cubes set entities on fire on collision
Magma cubes turn into slimes in water in the overworld
Piglins attack player if not wearing X golden armors
Piglins can spawn riding a hoglin
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.end.en: Endermen can give blindness on attack
Chorus plants are infested with endermites
text.autoconfig.sihywtcamd.option.bosses: A phantom can spawn when an end crystal is destroyed
Enderman can target its closest player when dragon is landed
The ender dragon summons 1 crystal for X health thresholds
Withers creates an explosion when half health
Withers can spawn wither skeletons when half health
advancements.full_golden_armor.title: Cover Me in Gold
advancements.full_golden_armor.descripti: Get a full suit of Golden armor to make Piglins neutral
advancements.zombified_piglin_brute_coll: Collide with a Brute variant of the Zombified Piglin and face the consequences
advancements.deflect_firework_rocket.des: Deflect a Firework Rocket shot from a Pillatrooper with a Shield
advancements.kill_illusioner.title: Now You See Me
advancements.kill_phantom_end.title: Got the Wrong Bird
advancements.kill_phantom_end.descriptio: Kill a Phantom spawned from an Ender Crystal
advancements.spyglass_at_baby_1.title: Is It a Tree?
advancements.spyglass_at_baby_1.descript: Look at a Baby Zombie holding another one through a Spyglass
advancements.spyglass_at_baby_4.title: Is It a Tower?
advancements.spyglass_at_baby_4.descript: Look at a Baby Zombie holding four other ones through a Spyglass
advancements.ride_zombie_horse.title: A Deadly Ride
advancements.ride_zombie_horse.descripti: Ride a Zombie Horse after defeating its previous rider
advancements.convert_magma.title: Cool It Down
advancements.convert_magma.description: Rescue a Magma Cube from the Nether, bring it safely home to the Overworld... and put it in water
advancements.convert_slime.title: Warm It Up
advancements.convert_slime.description: Rescue a Slime from the Overworld, bring it safely home to the Nether... and put it in lava
